episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4001_1001_02: I see you’re all in good health.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4001_1001_03: This place is pretty lively, huh.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4001_1001_04:
Right? It’s because Trainers from all sorts of
regions come here.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4001_1001_05:
We managed to make a ton of new friends, too,
didn’t we.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4001_1001_07: New friends, huh. That’s good to hear.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4001_1001_09:
Pasio’s about to get its own academy, so I can’t
keep letting my shyness hold me back.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4001_1001_11: Yeah, we’re helping set it up, too.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4001_1001_12: Actually, would you two like to lend a hand?
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4001_1001_13: The director and Lear would be thrilled!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4001_1001_14: Who is this “Lear” you speak of?
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4001_1001_15: He’s a big deal on this island!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4001_1001_16:
That’s not much of an explanation...but yeah,
that about sums him up.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4001_1001_17: Maybe you two could help design the uniforms?
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4001_1001_18:
We already have some pros working on the them,
but maybe you could join.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4001_1001_19:
Sounds great! Atticus designed Team Star’s
costumes, so he’d be perfect for the job!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4001_1001_20:
Yeah! And Mela’s a member of the art club, so it
should be a good fit for her, too!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4001_1001_23:
I only just joined the art club, and I’m not that
great at painting, so...
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4001_1001_24: I’d probably get just in Atticus’s way.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4001_1001_26: Your passion for painting is sincere, is it not?
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4001_1001_27:
But I shall not push thee—such a choice is thine to
make. Shouldst thou find thyself inclined to join, do
come and tell me.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/6801_1031_01:
Designs for the school
uniform, huh.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/6801_1001_01:
I know YOU’LL do fine, but I’m not sure I can be
of any help...
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/6801_1001_02:
In the eyes of a professional, my designs are
inadequate.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/6801_1001_03:
Still, we must press on—even if told our work is
not good enough!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/6801_1001_04:
Guess it’s a chance to leave an explosive
impression, huh.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4002_1001_01: You sure it’s OK for me to join?
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4002_1001_03:
And! ’Tis not merely a fashion designer we shall
meet today, but artists, too!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4002_1001_05:
In art, harmony is of great import. The uniforms’
design must be in accord with the school facilities.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4002_1001_06:
Only by hearing from artists of different genres
can a comprehensive decision be reached.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4002_1001_07: A lot of thought goes into this, huh.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4003_1001_02:
So, you’re both going to help us with the uniforms,
correct?
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4003_1001_03:
My name is Atticus! As yet, my skills are sadly
unrefined, but I am eager to begin our work.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4003_1001_04: I’m Mela... Nice to meet you.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4003_1001_05:
I’m, uh... Well, I’m part of the art club at my
school, and I’m also an all-rounder on Team Star.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4003_1001_06: By the way, I must say your outfits are lovely.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4003_1001_07: These be the costumes we wear as Team Star!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4003_1001_08:
Atticus made ’em by modifying our school uniform.
Pretty amazing, right?
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4003_1001_09: Wow... May I take a closer look?
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4003_1001_10: The way the colors blend here is very nice.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4003_1001_11: Oh dear, looks like she’s lost to the world now.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4003_1001_12:
When you see something new and fresh, it’s easy
to fixate on it, to the exclusion of all else. That
happens to me so much!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4003_1001_13: Are you the painters I’ve heard—
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4003_1001_14:
Yes indeedy! My name’s Burgh. I’m a Gym Leader
from Unova—and also an artist!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4003_1001_15:
I’m Mina—an Alolan captain who paints and
travels!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4003_1001_16: Oh, wow. Everyone here’s a pro, huh.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4003_1001_17:
The outfits you designed are absolutely
stunning, Atticus.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4003_1001_18: I’m excited to see more of your ideas.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4003_1001_19:
O, mine heart is giddy with glee! It’s an honor to
be a part of this project!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4003_1001_20:
A pro’s givin’ Atticus props... I always knew he
was impressive!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4003_1001_23:
We’ll all be helping with the uniform designs.
Glad to have you with us!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4003_1001_25: All right, then! Want one of my rice balls?
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4003_1001_27:
I made some when I heard we were getting more
people!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4003_1001_30:
By the way, what do you think of Bug-type
Pokémon?
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4003_1001_32: Well, you see, I looove Bug-type Pokémon!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4003_1001_33:
They’re a blend of two contrasting qualities—
fragility and strength.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4003_1001_34: Their forms are flawless and one of a kind!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4003_1001_40:
But I’ve only just gotten into it, so I’m not ready
to show anything—
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4003_1001_43: Show me something you’ve painted, Mela.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4004_1001_01:
Yikes. I ran outta there before even realizing what
I was doin’.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4004_1001_02: I don’t have anything I can show pros...
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4004_1001_03:
I’m not experienced like the rest of ’em.
Guess I shouldn’t’ve been there after all.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4004_1001_04:
(The closer I look at Pasio, the more I notice it’s
buzzin’ with unique characters.)
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4004_1001_05: (I bet they all have some dream or passion.)
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4004_1001_08: Who are you s’posed to be?
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4004_1001_10: Well, I’m Mela. I just came from Paldea.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4004_1001_11: Did something happen? Happy to help if I can!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4004_1001_12:
...So then, Mina asked me to show her something
I’ve painted, and I just couldn’t.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4004_1001_14:
I felt like...if I got criticized for somethin’ I really
like, I might never get over it.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4004_1001_15: I used to be jealous of people with dreams.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4004_1001_16:
But I kinda realized it’s tough to face somethin’
you’re passionate about.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4004_1001_17: So now I’ve even more respect for Atticus.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4004_1001_18:
Y’know, these boots are what got me into painting
in the first place.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4004_1001_19:
Well... I also have a dream: to become a
Pokémon professor.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4004_1001_20: Before that, I wanted to be a Champion.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4004_1001_21: But I couldn’t—that dream didn’t come true.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4004_1001_23:
But it’s not like I just settled for becoming a
Pokémon professor.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4004_1001_24: One dream didn’t work out, so I found a new one.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4004_1001_26:
If a dream doesn’t work out, it doesn’t mean it’s
all over.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4004_1001_27:
But you’re sure to regret it if you give up now
without giving it your all!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4004_1001_28:
I’ll help you. Let’s surprise the pros by painting
something amazing!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4004_1001_30: Once I’m set on somethin’, I always see it through.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4004_1001_31: Same with my dream—I ain’t backin’ down!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4005_1001_02:
You went outta your way to show me this
awesome view, but I still can’t get it right.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4005_1001_04: Yeah, but I’m gonna show this painting to pros.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4005_1001_05: The more I think it’s gotta be good, the more—
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4005_1001_09:
I get it. Even if others say it’s great, you might not
think so.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4005_1001_10: But don’t think TOO much, y’know!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4005_1001_12:
Sometimes you gotta embrace spontaneity and
let ideas flow!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4005_1001_13:
That’s right! You gotta ride the flow to reach
the sky!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4005_1001_15:
For real—there are so many spontaneous people
in the world!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4005_1001_16: Like...my old man, who’s a ship captain.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4005_1001_17:
He couldn’t give up his dream of being a movie
star. One time, he even ditched work to go act.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4005_1001_19: But y’know, I think you gotta be bold like him!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4005_1001_21: Why is it your dream to be a painter?
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4005_1001_23: Then enjoy it! There’s no point if you don’t!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4005_1001_24:
You should spread your wings and do what you
love, however you want!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4005_1001_25: Do what I love... However I want...
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4005_1001_26: Got it. I’ll try to have fun with what I’m doing.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4006_1001_02: Might not be the best, but I had fun painting it.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4006_1001_03: Now I have something to show to Mina. ...Oh?
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4007_1001_01: I presented my uniform designs to Lady Valerie.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4007_1001_02: She said she would weave in any good ideas.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4007_1001_03:
Yet it seems none were deemed good enough to
be adopted as they were.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4007_1001_05: Yes. It did not unfold as I had hoped.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4007_1001_06:
My designs are an expression of all the things
I love.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4007_1001_07: But the school uniform is for everyone.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4007_1001_08:
What the creator cherishes is of import, yet that
alone is not enough...or so I was told.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4007_1001_09: Wow. So even you feel like this sometimes.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4007_1001_10:
Of course! I, too, am human...yet I shall not
abandon my quest!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4007_1001_11:
I will bring forth new designs for Valerie
tomorrow and hope she approves them!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4007_1001_13:
I’m gonna show Mina a painting of mine, and I
won’t run away this time.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4007_1001_15:
Splendid! I shall be strengthened in spirit if thou
comest with me!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4007_1001_16: Yeah! Let’s both try our best—for our dreams!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4008_1001_02: It’s lovely to see you, too, Mela.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4008_1001_04: Do you have your designs with you today, Atticus?
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4008_1001_06:
I heeded thy words from yesterday and changed
my approach!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4008_1001_07:
For example, here I have prioritized comfort whilst
still retaining a sense of luxury...
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4008_1001_08:
(I bet Atticus was also scared to show
his designs.)
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4008_1001_09:
(I can’t just sit here feeling overwhelmed when
my friend’s givin’ it his all!)
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4008_1001_13:
Sorry for running off the other day. I...um...
wanna ask for a do-over...
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4008_1001_14: Could you have a...look at my painting?
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4008_1001_15: Sure! I was waiting for this!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4008_1001_17:
You met some new people, which helped you put
a lot of thought into it. Right?
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4008_1001_18:
I can tell just by looking at this painting. I like
it a lot!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4008_1001_19: I agree! It’s vibrant and full of possibilities!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4008_1001_21: I am happy for thee, Lady Mela!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4008_1001_22: Oh, but when it comes to using color...
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4008_1001_23:
if you add a touch of black here, it tightens the
overall tone, even if the color wasn’t actually in
the scenery.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4008_1001_24:
What you see with your eyes isn’t the only truth.
You should paint what feels right!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4008_1001_27:
Indeed, ’tis a truly splendid painting. So bold, yet
there be a hint of familiarity.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4008_1001_29:
Lady Valerie, my sincerest apologies, but may I ask
you to wait a little longer?
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4008_1001_30: Did you come up with something good?
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4008_1001_31:
That’s perfectly fine. Take all the time you need.
Don’t worry about me.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4008_1001_33:
Lady Mela! Could you join me so that we may
dream up new ideas together?
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4008_1001_35: The two of them seemed to be struggling a lot.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4008_1001_36:
But it seems there’s nothing to worry about
anymore!
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4008_1001_37:
Going after your dreams can be scary, but the
excitement can’t be beat.
episode_event_ch0320_ch0328/4008_1001_38:
Just look at their faces. I’m sure they’ll be
just fine.
